thread.section_title: Rosewood Beijing - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A very comfortable home
thread.title_full: A very comfortable home - Review of Rosewood Beijing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: 602anniew
title: A very comfortable home
text:
This hotel gives you a home vibe. The room is very spacious and very comfortable. The breakfast buffet in the restaurant is good too. The staff is very efficient and friendly. Although the price isn't "friendly " , you won't be disappointed.
這間酒店的價格不斐，但服務和房間都有到水準，不會讓你失望。 房間很大，自動化的設備很現代，但又有自己的風格。一定要說缺點的話，就是附近沒什麼便利商店。但房間很舒服，不出門也沒關係。
